Cyclone Gabrielle: Bill Chrystal on partner Shona Wilson’s death in landslide https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/cyclone-gabrielle-bill-chrystal-on-partner-shona-wilsons-death-in-landslide/IK6JH3QCAJEKBJPRKIQ5HJST54/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/cyclone-gabrielle-bill-chrystal-on-partner-shona-wilsons-death-in-landslide/IK6JH3QCAJEKBJPRKIQ5HJST54/ Cherie HowieA torrent of mud killed his partner as she slept.
